author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a logical bug in how the trends vs luminosity are produced by the widely used `MultiRunAndPlotPVValidation` validation macro, when the input luminosity per run are supplied via external file, as reported by @alelek.
I profit of this PR to introduce some better handling of the exceptions and messages.

**N.B.**: the standard way of retrieving the information from the input ROOT file is unaffected.

#### PR validation:

Running the macro with the bug:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/94305041-e0228480-ff70-11ea-96a3-c225c625b17b.png)

and without the bug:

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5082376/94305073-eb75b000-ff70-11ea-8210-1004bfd698ea.png)
